We're thankful for provision in this life
if He chooses to give it.

3181.51.text:
We're thankful for health in this life if
He chooses for His purposes to render it to

3187.98.text:
We're equally thankful for deprivation, suffering,
persecution, illness, even facing death, if

3198.82.text:
that is for His glory who is our Master and
whose slaves we are.

3206.96.text: We have come for the words of life.

3210.11.text: When Jesus said, "Will you also go away?"

3212.77.text:
Peter said, "To whom shall we go, You and
You alone have the words of eternal life."

3217.29.text: We want Jesus for the words.

3218.99.text: We want Him for the truth.

3221.39.text: We can do without the health and wealth.

3224.44.text: But we cannot do without the truth.

3229.33.text:
We embrace Him as Savior and Lord, because
He is and because He speaks a gospel which

3235.55.text:
we believe and desperately need, to rescue
us from eternal hell and send us into glory

3245.26.text:
Thank You, God, for the gift of Your Son,
thank You, Christ, for coming.

3249.70.text: Thank You for being our Lord and Master.

3252.06.text:
Thank You, Holy Spirit, for giving us the
Word and the record of these things to guide

3256.87.text:
us that our approach to the Savior might be
the right one.

3262.31.text:
We want to be among those who don't go away
because we want the words because the words

3272.28.text:
They cause us to believe and to possess the
hope of heaven.

3279.23.text: Thank You for our time together in worship.

3282.02.text:
Bless every life and confirm the truth in
every heart.

3285.71.text:
Father, now send us on our way with thankful
hearts, grateful hearts, overwhelmed by again

3286.71.text:
the richness of Your truth and the promise
of life that comes through Your Son.
